1.title: All My Exes Live in Texas
1.plot: Shelley Buttman hosts her video blog while her roommate Blake films. As she recounts her latest triumphs on the Austin acting scene, she gets some unexpected news via tweet.

2.title: No One Can Eat Fifty Eggs
2.plot: Shelley Buttman goes on an audition where she has to go up against her rival and Sweet Poppa Bill. Her roommate Blake and cameraman Cousin Larry provide moral support.

3.title: Bye Bye Bertie or Singles Group Magic
3.plot: Shelley is joined in the Cooler Than You studios by her best friend Christina R. Chris has urged Shelley to try out a singles group, and they watch the results: an awkward date with a dreamboat named Milton.

4.title: Le Headshots
4.plot: Shelley has another audition against Audrey Rose. Then she gets new head shots and meets EC and Jean Pierre-Paul, a very unique photography pair. Shelley's also gotten news that she has an audition for the new Tarantino movie.

5.title: Occupy (John) Wall Street
5.plot: Shelley Buttman launches a one woman protest in front of an elementary school to save girls' little league soccer and prepare for her Tarantino audition. She is absolutely not on that street because it's in John Wall's neighborhood.

6.title: Uranus, Buttman, and Yoga
6.plot: Shelley goes on her big audition for the Quentin Tarantino movie only to have her current agent and ex-boyfriend, John Wall, show up.

imdb.plot outline: Episode 1: All My Exes Live In Texas - Shelley and Blake are discussing her week in acting when Shelley gets a shocking tweet. Episode 2: No One Can Eat Fifty Eggs - Still raw from being dumped, Shelley goes on the strangest audition of the year. Episode 3: Singles Group Magic - Shelley takes her best friend's advice and goes on a coffee date with a guy she met at a singles group. Episode 4: Le Headshots - Deciding it's time for a change, Shelley goes on a photo shoot to get the perfect head shot and finds out she's got an audition for a Tarantino movie. Episode 5: Occupy (John) Wall Street - Shelley stages a peaceful one woman protest to get into character and stick up for girl's little league soccer. Episode 6: Uranus, Buttman, and Yoga - Shelley goes on the biggest audition of her life only to be confronted by her ex-boyfriend. Will she take him back?
imdb.title: Cooler Than You
plot: Follow Shelley Buttman's maturation as she records her weekly video blog chronicling her misadventures in love and acting, and find out each week why no matter how awkwardly her audition or date might go she is still cooler than you.::Olive Sancho
